animeTitle: The Descent of the Spiritual Deity
otherNames: The Descent of the Spiritual Deity, Born To Be A Legend, El Descenso de la Deidad Espiritual, Son of Spirit Venerable, 灵尊之子, 霊尊之子, 靈尊之子, Son of Lingzun,最強靈尊的小兒子,靈尊之子（最強靈尊的小兒子）,Son of Lingzun (youngest son of the strongest Lingzun),灵尊之子
synopsis: A genius who has been bored with the real world, reborn into another world where only the strong is highly honored and becomes the son of the strongest Spiritual masters in the world. What kind of adventures are waiting for him?
